Interested in speaking, voluntering or sponsoring? Let's connect at ken\[[@torontojs.com](http://@torontojs.com)\]([mailto:organizers@torontojs.com](http://mailto:organizers@torontojs.com)).

TorontoJS is committed to creating a safe and inclusive environment for all. Our Code of Conduct applies both online and in person at all our events and spaces.
